trans-unit.source: Azure Traffic Manager REST API Reference
trans-unit.target: Azure Traffic Manager REST API Reference

trans-unit.source: Use these APIs to create and modify Traffic Manager profiles, their associated endpoints, and other settings.
trans-unit.target: Use these APIs to create and modify Traffic Manager profiles, their associated endpoints, and other settings.

trans-unit.source: Each profile is managed as an Azure Resource, of type <link xlink:href="d066cb34-75f0-46ff-9881-4e6b5d87d3da" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Traffic Manager Profiles</link>.
trans-unit.target: Each profile is managed as an Azure Resource, of type <link xlink:href="d066cb34-75f0-46ff-9881-4e6b5d87d3da" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Traffic Manager Profiles</link>.

trans-unit.source: See "Using resource groups to manage your Azure resources" for more details on resources groups and Azure resources.
trans-unit.target: See "Using resource groups to manage your Azure resources" for more details on resources groups and Azure resources.

trans-unit.source: All operations conform to the HTTP/1.1 protocol specification, you must make sure that requests made to these resources are secure.
trans-unit.target: All operations conform to the HTTP/1.1 protocol specification, you must make sure that requests made to these resources are secure.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="a1caa0f7-3250-46ed-95b5-8603d902383b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">“Authenticating Azure Resource Manager requests”</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="a1caa0f7-3250-46ed-95b5-8603d902383b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">“Authenticating Azure Resource Manager requests”</link>.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Note</embeddedLabel>: The Azure DNS service is currently in preview mode.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Note</embeddedLabel>: The Azure DNS service is currently in preview mode.
